TECHNOLOGICAL CAPABILITIES OF THE ENTERPRISE
  • CASTING

    • Castings are made from cast iron of grades SCh15, SCh20 by the method of casting in sand-clay molds with manual molding (on the platform) and casting in a chill mold.
    - platform molding: maximum casting weight - 1000 kg
    - casting in a chill mold: maximum casting weight - up to 20 kg

  • WELDED METAL STRUCTURES

    • maximum dimensions — 3500x2100x1500 mm
    maximum weight — up to 300 kg.

  • BLACKSMITH AND STAMPING PRODUCTION

    • Production of forgings by open forging and forging in undercut dies on hammers (weight of falling parts 700 kg, 400 kg, 160 kg).
    Bending of sheet metal parts on an edge bending press: maximum length - up to 3 m, maximum width of the part - 1.2 m, weight - up to 20 kg.

  • MACHINING PRODUCTION
    • Turning work

      • Machining of parts on turning-screw-cutting, turning-turret machines, automatic lathes and semi-automatic CNC machines:
      - chuck work from piece blanks with a diameter of up to 630 mm
      - from a rod with a diameter of up to 65 mm
      - machining in centers: maximum diameter - 350 mm, maximum length - 2800 mm

    • Drilling work

      • Hole processing:
      - on manual and CNC vertical drilling machines: maximum drilling diameter - 35 mm, part height - up to 500 mm, maximum drilling length - 175 mm
      - on radial drilling machines: maximum drilling diameter - 100 mm
      - maximum overall dimensions of the processed parts: length - 3500 mm, width - 1300 mm, height - 1500 mm

    • Boring work

      • Boring work:
      - processing of parts on horizontal boring machines and machining centers:
      - maximum overall dimensions of the parts being processed: length - 500 mm, width - 2000 mm, height - 2000 mm
      - maximum diameter of boring - 400 mm
      - processing of precision parts on coordinate boring machines: maximum diameter of boring - 500 mm, maximum dimensions of the parts being processed - 800x800x800 mm, maximum weight of the part being processed - 800 kg
      Processing accuracy:
      - diameter constancy in the cross section - 0.002 mm
      - in any section - 0.006 mm
      - roundness - 0.003 mm
      - end face plane - 0.008 mm

    • Grinding work

      • Grinding work:
      - grinding of external surfaces on cylindrical grinding machines: maximum diameter - 400 mm, maximum grinding length - 2000 mm
      Processing accuracy: roundness - 0.0016-0.0008 mm, roughness - 0.32-0.16 mm
      - grinding of holes on internal grinding machines: maximum diameter - 450 mm, minimum diameter - 20 mm, grinding length - up to 320 mm
      Processing accuracy: taper - 0.006-0.004 mm, roundness - 0.004-0.001 mm, roughness - 0.32 mm
      - grinding on surface grinding machines: maximum dimensions of the processed parts: length - 2000 mm, width - 630 mm
      Processing accuracy: flatness — 0.006-0.004 mm, parallelism — 0.004 mm, roughness — 0.32 mm
      - longitudinal grinding on longitudinal grinding machines:
      processing of body parts with maximum dimensions: length — 6000 mm, width — 1800 mm, height — 1500 mm
      Processing accuracy: straightness per 1000 mm of length — 0.002 mm, parallelism per 1000 mm of length — 0.004 mm, roughness — 0.80 mm
      - centerless grinding: grinding diameter — from 4 to 8 mm, grinding length — up to 1000 mm, roughness — 0.63 mm
      - spline grinding: grinding of spline shafts with a diameter from 25 mm to 125 mm, grinding length - up to 1250 mm, length of the installed product - 1400 mm, number of teeth of the separating disk - 48
      Processing accuracy: parallelism of the tooth to the axis of the product - 0.012 mm, length - 300 mm, roughness - 0.25 mm
      - thread grinding:
      dimensions of the workpiece: diameter - up to 200 mm, length - up to 1500 mm, step of the grinding thread metric from 1.5 to 24 mm, trapezoidal from 2 to 24 mm, number of grinding thread passes from 1 to 24
      Processing accuracy: step: per 25 mm - Ø 0.005 mm, per 300 mm - Ø 0.009 mm, with lifting helix — Ø 0.004 mm
      by average diameter: oval — 0.005 mm, cone — 0.012/500 mm

    • Gear machining


      • - milling of gears, gears, gear shafts on gear milling machines: minimum module — 2, maximum module — 6, maximum diameter — 800 mm, maximum height — 275 mm, support rotation angle — 60 degrees, accuracy level — 8, roughness — Rz 12.5
      - gear hobbing on gear hobbing machines:
      with external tooth: minimum module — 2, maximum module — 6, maximum diameter — 500 mm, maximum height — 105 mm, accuracy level — 8
      with internal tooth: minimum module — 2, maximum module — 6, maximum diameter — 400 mm, maximum height — 85 mm, accuracy level – 8
      - gear hobbing on gear hobbing machines: minimum module — 1.5, maximum module — 8, maximum diameter — 600 mm, maximum height — 90 mm, accuracy level — 9, roughness — Rz 20
      - gear grinding: minimum module — 0.5, maximum module — 10, maximum diameter — 500 mm, maximum height — 212 mm, accuracy level — 6, roughness — 0.80, inclination angle — 45 degrees
      - rail gearing: maximum module — 8, length of the cutting rail — 1100 mm, accuracy level — 8, roughness — Rz 20

    • Milling work

      • - milling of body parts on longitudinal milling machines:
      Limited processing dimensions: length - 6000 mm, width - 2000 mm, height - 2000 mm
      - milling of body and plane parts on vertical milling and horizontal milling machines:
      Limited processing dimensions: length - 1500 mm, width - 600 mm, height - 550 mm

    • Planing work

      • - planing of large, medium-sized body parts on longitudinal planing machines
      Limited processing dimensions: length - 8000 mm, width - 2800 mm, height - 2450 mm
      - planing of bodies, flat parts on cross-planing machines
      Limited processing dimensions: length - 700 mm, width - 400 mm, height - 550 mm

    • Horizontal and extended work

      • maximum slide stroke length — 1200 mm,
      maximum part diameter — 600 mm,
      maximum drawing force — 10 kN.

  • HEAT TREATMENT

    • The size of the working space of thermal furnaces:
    - cementation — ø600x1200 mm
    - normalization — 600x1200x500 mm
    - hardening with high-frequency heating — ø400x2000 mm
    - low tempering — 650x1300x400 mm
    - improvement — 600x1200x500 mm
    - volume hardening — 600x1200x500 mm
    - annealing, high tempering, stabilizing tempering: W600x1200 mm; W1000x1000 mm; 650x1300x400 mm

  • GALVANIZING PRODUCTION

    • - oxidation:
    maximum dimensions of processed parts: 1200x1000x600 mm
    - chrome plating:
    maximum dimensions of processed parts: 3000x300x150 mm
    - zinc plating:
    maximum dimensions of processed parts: 600x400x200 mm
    - tin plating:
    maximum dimensions of processed parts: 400x300x150 mm

  • MANUFACTURING OF RUBBER PRODUCTS

    • Applicable rubber grades:
    7-4004 TUZ8005204-84;
    7-3825 TUZ8005204-71;
    7-4161 TUZ8005204-71.
    Maximum pressing force 1000 kN

  • MANUFACTURING OF PLASTIC PRODUCTS
    • Pressing method

      • Recycled materials:
      Phenoplast FF202 GOST 28804-90
      Phenoplast FF1U1 GOST 28804-90
      Equipment used — hydraulic press D2430B

    • Injection molding method

      • Recycled materials:
      Polyethylene 10703-020 GOST 16337-77
      Polyethylene 21008-075 GOST 16338-85
      Polypropylene 01010-06 GOST 26996-86
      Polystyrene PSM-111-20 GOST 20282-86
      Equipment used — Automatic thermoforming machine — DE3330F1.
